meanings.definition: A temporary mold or structure used in construction to shape concrete or other materials.
meanings.sent1: The formworks were set up to pour the concrete for the foundation.
meanings.sent2: The workers carefully removed the formworks after the concrete had dried.
meanings.sent3: The formworks decided to take a break and relax in the shade.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a formworks, shaping her ideas into reality.
meanings.sent5: The formworks stood tall, ready to transform the shape of the building.

meanings.definition: The process or act of creating or using formworks.
meanings.sent1: The formworks required precise measurements to ensure a perfect fit.
meanings.sent2: Learning about formworks helped him understand the construction process better.
meanings.sent3: The formworks threw a party to celebrate their successful completion of the project.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the formworks that guided him through each step.
meanings.sent5: The formworks of innovation led to groundbreaking developments in the industry.
